A Name You Can Rely On

Silver Colin

Corporate principles and workplace culture are important to us. Our personnel are dedicated to long-term strategic alliances that provide value beyond the terms of our customers' contracts.
[vc_empty_space height=”10px”][vc_column_text]Early in 1976, Shri Dwarka Das Mittal, the group’s founder, laid the foundations of a modest Solvent Extraction Unit in Ahmedabad, Gujarat. At Present, Silver Colin is one of the biggest vertically integrated edible oil complexes in India.

Silver Colin also had great success in the real estate sector. Townships like Ganpati Enclave, Sheesh Mahal, Sushant City 1, and Sushant City 2 are examples of our signature development work. For the inhabitants of Malwa, all the projects have redefined luxurious life. The Silver Colin also successfully built DD Mittal Towers, which strives to offer its clients premium housing at reasonable costs. Mittal City Mall has also become the foremost commercial space in Malwa and continues to entertain great crowds every day.[/vc_column_text]

Our Mission

The goal is to establish a brand in the edible oil, real estate, and distillery industries with inventiveness, novelty, and uniformity as our company's trademark, which is progressively altering the appearance of our nation.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”icon-box-colum” width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1654577466002{margin-top: 15px !important;}”]

Our vision

Our ambition is to expand and bring our clients along for the journey with us. Together, we seek our mutual gain and the good of all.
[/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner el_class=”icon-box-colum” width=”1/3″ css=”.vc_custom_1654577472181{margin-top: 15px !important;}”]

Our Group Companies

BCL Industries Ltd, Ganpati Estates, Ganpati Township Ltd, Sheesh Mahal Developers, VKM Townships Ltd.
